text: Nasrudin said the great emperor Tamerlan, I have decided to appoint you supreme judge! It is an honor, Your Excellency, but I am not worthy of it. Are you rejecting a royal warrant? I have no choice, Your Majesty. A judge must be a pure and just man. That's right. Well, I said I'm not worthy. If I'm telling the truth, then I shouldn't be a judge, and if I'm lying, then how is a liar going to become a Supreme Court judge? FIN
title: Nasrudín y Tamerlán
author: nan Anónimo
